titles.title: Middle Market IPO Underwriting Cost Act
To require the Securities and Exchange Commission to carry out a study of the direct and indirect underwriting fees, including gross spreads, for mid-sized initial public offerings.

bill.summary:
Middle Market IPO Underwriting Cost Act
This bill directs the Securities and Exchange Commission to report on direct and indirect underwriting costs associated with initial public offerings for small- and medium-sized companies.
